content: If the voices inside don’t know how to shut up, just ask them, do you really know me? Me! The me I am that is the best me of the whole entire universe, me. That me, what will you say to that me! And then listen for them to speak, they’ll say nothing, nothing at all. You are perfect just the way you are. Because you are designed by perfection. Follow your perfect and find freedom from definition by those who don’t know that me. Xo, Sondra
